product_name: LancomeRenergie Lift Multi-Action Ultra Eye Cream
summary: SummaryRÃ©nergie Lift Multi-Action Ultra Eye Cream by LancÃ´me is a silky, anti-aging eye cream that visibly reduces dark circles, depuffs eye bags, and smooths fine lines for re-hydrated, younger-looking eyes.
details: DetailsFeaturesRÃ©nergie Lift Multi-Action Ultra Eye Cream - Dark Circle Correcting Eye Cream with Hyaluronic Acid & Caffeine is a silky, anti-aging eye cream that visibly reduces dark circles, depuffs eye bags, and smooths fine lines for re-hydrated, younger-looking eyesInfused with Hyaluronic Acid, Caffeine, Linseed Extract and Cocoa Seed Butter, the creamy formula melts onto skin to instantly smooth and fill the delicate eye area with all-day hydrationVisibly revitalized, skin looks more radiant and tighter, as if lifted after a good night's sleepBenefitsClinical Dark Circle Efficacy Assessed by Dermatologist*:Clinically proven to reduce the visibility and color intensity of dark circles.*Based on expert grading in an 8-week clinical study.In 8-week consumer self-assessment tests on 61 women:After 1 use: women said that they didn't feel they needed to use as much under-eye concealer.After 2 weeks: women said skin felt firmer and looked healthier with less visible dark circles.After 1 jar: women said skin looked younger, with signs of fatigue visibly reduced.Suitable for all skin types and sensitive eyes. Dermatologist-tested and ophthalmologist-tested for safety.Key IngredientsHyaluronic Acid - known for its ability to enhance moisture retention and skin hydration, and to help strengthen skin's moisture barrier functionsCaffeine - known for its ability to help reduce the appearance of under-eye bags, puffiness and dark circles, and to help support antioxidant protection against free radicals, which can cause skin damageLinseed Extract - known for its anti-aging properties and abilities to help reduce signs of aging linked to collagen loss, including helping to: reduce wrinkles and increase firmnessItem 2612982How To UseUse daily, in the morning and at night, on a cleansed and makeup-free face after using your eye serum, and before using your face serum and facial moisturizer.How to Apply: Gently dab a pea-sized amount of the cream along the lower eye contours (under-eye area), then smooth the cream all around the eye area using light strokes, from the inner to outer corners of the eyes, until the cream is completely absorbed.Pro Tip: Target signs of aging and fatigue with a Re-Energizing Eye Massage: After applying the eye cream, form a small "peace sign" by placing your index and middle fingers on each side of your eyebrow, then press and lift the eyes by using light pressure to slide your fingers from the base of your eyebrows to the tip. Repeat this step 3 times. Then, help depuff and correct the appearance of dark circles by using your ring finger to gently tap along the lower eye contour from the inner corner to the temples.Follow with: RÃ©nergie Lift Multi-Action Ultra Cream SPF 30 or RÃ©nergie Lift Multi-Action Ultra Oil-Free Lotion SPF 30.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Theobroma Cacao Seed Butter / Cocoa Seed Butter, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Isohexadecane, Propanediol, Alcohol Denat., Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-20 Stearate, PEG/Ppg/Polybutylene Glycol-8/5/3 Glycerin, Stearic Acid, PEG-100 Stearate, Palmitic Acid, Octyldodecanol, Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Ci 16035 / Red 40, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Guanosine, Mica, Secale Cereale Seed Extract / Rye Seed Extract, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Hydrolyzed Linseed Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Adenosine, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-9, Caffeine, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Polyacrylamide, Dimethiconol, Limonene, Pentylene Glycol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tin Oxide, Benzyl Alcohol, Caprylyl Glycol, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Myristic Acid, Geraniol, Laureth-7, Parfum / Fragrance.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use daily, in the morning and at night, on a cleansed and makeup-free face after using your eye serum, and before using your face serum and facial moisturizer.How to Apply: Gently dab a pea-sized amount of the cream along the lower eye contours (under-eye area), then smooth the cream all around the eye area using light strokes, from the inner to outer corners of the eyes, until the cream is completely absorbed.Pro Tip: Target signs of aging and fatigue with a Re-Energizing Eye Massage: After applying the eye cream, form a small "peace sign" by placing your index and middle fingers on each side of your eyebrow, then press and lift the eyes by using light pressure to slide your fingers from the base of your eyebrows to the tip. Repeat this step 3 times. Then, help depuff and correct the appearance of dark circles by using your ring finger to gently tap along the lower eye contour from the inner corner to the temples.Follow with: RÃ©nergie Lift Multi-Action Ultra Cream SPF 30 or RÃ©nergie Lift Multi-Action Ultra Oil-Free Lotion SPF 30.

reviews.headline: Best Eyecream
reviews.comments: You can never be dissatisfied with this eyecream; Lancome is tops.  Not heavy, absorbs very well.

reviews.headline: Very good eye cream
reviews.comments: I love the whole Renergie line and this eye cream is great. It's very moisturizing and it has light refraction to make the eye area bringher. I would recommend purchasing this cream.

reviews.headline: Didn't Work for Me
reviews.comments: I'm 48 and used this religously for three months and saw absolutely no difference. Not even a little bit.  Thankfully, I purchased it during a 'Love Your Skin' event in '24, so only paid half of the regular price.

reviews.headline: I'd suggest Mario Badescu Glycolic Eye Cream
reviews.comments: Hi, so I've been using Lancome products for a few years now and honestly I've not been super impressed with them. In regards to under eye circles, my friend and I have both had amazing results using Mario Badescu's Glycolic Eye Cream with Vitamin E. So, if you're looking to eliminate dark circles, I highly suggest going with the Mario Badescu eye cream. It works wonderfully and is much lower cost.

reviews.headline: Has cancer causing ingredients :(
reviews.comments: It is well known now that Red 40 is an ingredient linked to cancer. Products with Red 40 in the EU must have a warning label. I'm surprised a "French" brand doesn't warn of the cancer risk. Returning!

reviews.headline: Its okay, just okay . but please bring back Progres !!
reviews.comments:
Its okay but I
 also wish they would bring back Progres .eye cream ,  it was wonderful and the ones that have replaced it can't hold a candle . Why do they discontinue items only to bring out something inferior. ? I would recommend it at a sale price .

reviews.headline: A staple for me
reviews.comments: I love this eye cream and haven't tried Ben looked at another type in years. Very hydrating but not greasy gives a bit of a reflective finish to help with the dark circles and a perfect base for concealer. I use to get super dry under eye and concealer would cake/set into fine lines. The cream completely solved that issue for me. Pricey but a container usually lasts me 6 plus months using twice a day.

reviews.headline: Loved it for years!!
reviews.comments: Been using LancÃ´me skin care for years! Long before I could really afford it! That said, I wouldn't go a day without it!

reviews.headline: I will continue to purchase this product!
reviews.comments: I have been using Lancome Renergie Lift Multi-Action Ultra Eye Cream for years and will continue to use it!

reviews.headline: Bye bye crow's feet
reviews.comments: I bought this product to help with my under eye creases and the crows feet I started to notice when I smiled. I honestly don't see a difference at all with my under eye creases, but those crow's feet are gone. For that reason I continue to buy this product.

reviews.headline: Bring back Renergie multi action
reviews.comments: Horrible - dries ur skin - package says flammable until dry bc of all the alcohol - please bring back old Renergie multi action

reviews.headline: Nice eye cream, results are mixed
reviews.comments: I bought this on sale and got a great price, but not sure I would pay full price for this. It's a nice eye cream overall, goes on really smoothly and a little goes a long way. I do feel it smooths my under eye and has brightened my undereye area somewhat. I also have hereditary dark circles and while an eye cream can only do so much, I wanted to see a little more. Still, I am mostly happy with it.

reviews.headline: Eyes feel great but no change
reviews.comments: I really like how this goes on. It doesn't change the look of the fine lines at all.

reviews.headline: Good for eye bags & dark circles.
reviews.comments: Got this specifically because it targets puffy under eyes & dark circles. I have noticed a difference in just a couple of days ! Hopefully it continues to show improvements.

reviews.headline: Never thought higher prices got better results
reviews.comments: I do not write reviews but I read them.  The product results were as advertised.  I couldn't believe it.  My mom used to tell me my eyes looked like two burnt holes in a saddle blanket.  Well, they don't now!  LancÃ´me eye cream solved that problem.

reviews.headline: Eye Cream
reviews.comments: This is my first time using this product. So far, I like what I see, and how it feels on my skin. I have sensitive skin but this product doesn't bother me.  The cream is light weight , you only need a small amount.  I've been using this now for about two weeks.  I do recommend this product.

reviews.headline: great product
reviews.comments: I found something that saved me from doing the surgery on my left lid, which is droopy. I just dab it all around my eyes, not stinging at all, and it is way better than before, it is expensive for a small amount, but it's worth it than having surgery. Just a tip: I place them inside the refrigerator to maintain the freshness.

reviews.headline: amazing eye cream
reviews.comments: best anti-aging eye cream. seen so much improvement using this product in my morning and night skin care routine.

reviews.headline: Very moisturizing!
reviews.comments: This eye cream is excellent for moisturizing and diminishing wrinkles and crow's feet around the outer corners of the eyes.

reviews.headline: Moisturizing butâ€¦
reviews.comments: Eye cream is moisturizing  but the only part I didn't like is jar is half way . For that price should be full . Disappointed

faceoff_positive.comments: Best on the market w/o losing an arm and leg. Thank you LancÃ´me for keeping your wonderful products affordable. Splurge a little more than non designer cremes it's well worth it. I save up.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best affordable eye cream!

faceoff_negative.comments:
Bought this to try because my favorite eye cream of all time has been discontinued by Lancome. I have used the Progres eye cream since I was 15 years old and I'm 58 now.  That's 43 years of using nothing but Progres. 

Will you please consider bringing it back?  I know I'm not the only one who loved it. There is nothing better or even equal.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not even close
